sections.MISSION:
Bull Troop conducts Obstacle Course IVO Camp Aachen on 180930AUG2022 in order to provide build unit cohesion and Soldier movement proficiency.
Leader’s
sections.PURPOSE: of this event is to test Soldier’s ability to maneuver over complex obstacles and test general fitness.
sections.EXECUTION:
of each lane.
Following orientation walk through Bull Troop will break down into 2-man buddy teams and execute the O-Course for time. Scores will be recorded at the end of the course
If time permits, each Soldier will run the O-Course individually for time. Winners will have their score recorded at the end of the run.

sections.END STATE:
/Training Outcomes:
All Soldiers safely and successfully execute the Obstacle Course
Concept of the Operation: Bull SPs via Stryker to the Obstacle Course NLT 0845. CASEVAC vehicle is established and Soldiers receive a safety brief. Bull will break into teams of no greater than 10 pax, each led by an air assault qualified individual for a demonstration and individual
